General.Name: Taiwan Sanyo Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Sanyo Electric Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells home appliances in Taiwan and internationally. It offers air conditioners, refrigerators, freezers, televisions, audio visual peripherals, cooking products, home living products, bathroom ventilation heaters, dehumidifiers, fans, and digital communication products under the SANLUX brand. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
